newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cimatron buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cimatron buy repeated.

text.p: -- Needham & Co analyst John Barr said he repeated a buy rating on Cimatron Ltd.

-- He said he reduced his earnings estimate for the company to $0.05 per share from $0.11 for the third quarter, and to $0.40 from $0.50 for 1996. He also reduced his revenue estimate to $17.2 million from $17.9 million for 1996.

-- Cimatron said Friday its third quarter results would be significantly lower than analysts' estimates. It said much of the anticipated decrease results from about $700,000 in expenses for Cimatron Technologies Inc, which is trying to expand the company's North American distribution network.

-- Barr said the "circumstances are not nearly as severe as the announcement indicated". He said about half of the expenses comes from a "one-time reclassification of maintenance revenues at a distributor," which Cimatron does not own.

-- Barr said the company's cash and securities are estimated about $1.70 per share, and said the stock is valued at less than two times 1997 earnings. He said the company is growing at about 30 percent per year.
